alert.note: Alert for Newberry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 1:53PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Newberry County through 230 PM EDT... At 153 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Prosperity, or 7 miles southwest of VC Summer Nuclear Station. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Little Mountain and Pomaria. This includes Interstate 26 between mile markers 81 and 87. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
